name: Virtual Marksman: Blood in the Snow
name_original: Virtual Marksman: Blood in the Snow
description:
*** This game is made for the Oculus Quest****

Shoot your way through different types of enemies and collect power ups like Slow Motion, Infinite Arrows, Homing Arrows and Extra Lives to survive as long as you can. Keep your head on a swivel as endless Villagers and Attack Dogs Come from all directions to try to get you out of their Home, but not if you have anything to say about it.

Can you beat all 20 waves of Viking MADNESS!!?? Probably not, but one thing is for sure, by the end of it there will be Blood on the Snow!

****This game gets ridiculously hard when you get into the later rounds, I’m not even 100% Sure it can be beaten but it’s good fun trying all the same. ***

Please leave comments on things you like and ways I can improve the game.
